title: Rule 17: Salary, Allowances and Service Conditions of the Chairperson and Members
description: Rule 17 specifies the financial and service-related terms for the Chairperson and Members of the Data Protection Board of India. These details are important to ensure that the leadership of the Board can function independently, without undue influence from external pressures.
